channel.title: 508 help me plz!
channel.description: Whenever i download a source or client for a 508 or 377 sometimes it has run but most of time it doesnt. If it has it doesnt work. Ive been told to copy a run from a diff server into one to give it a run... it then shows up for less than a second and disappears. Ive been told to get a better version of java also. I have jdk 6.12 so which of these ways works and what am i doing wrong? I dont use 508s much so plz help!

item.title: 508 help me plz!
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Zeroh, post:2, topic:275897”]Okay when you run the 508 source do you have another source running? or is the run you have connecting the right way? Im using Espeon base and I dont know what you have.

My run looks like this

@echo off
cls
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\java.exe” net/com/espeon/Server 43594
goto main
pause

it shows up for sec then for 1 second something shows up like an error and it dissapears… help me!!

Only time that happens to me is when i forget to close one of my running source’s…
If you want add me on msn if you got Ct55ftball@hotmail.com I think i could help you.[/quote]

mine is this

@echo off cls cd ../build "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\java.exe" net/com/espeon/Server 43594 goto main pause[ /code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 27, 2009, 01:29:36 pm[/size][hr]mine is same but i have jdk 6.12 and u 11 other than that its same and it shows up for sec and dissapears and nothing else running…

Read full topic

item.title: 508 help me plz!
item.dc:creator: @Zeroh Zeroh
item.description:
@Zeroh wrote:

Okay when you run the 508 source do you have another source running? or is the run you have connecting the right way? Im using Espeon base and I dont know what you have.

My run looks like this

@echo off
cls
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\java.exe” net/com/espeon/Server 43594
goto main
pause

Only time that happens to me is when i forget to close one of my running source’s…
If you want add me on msn if you got Ct55ftball@hotmail.com I think i could help you.

Read full topic
